group_1.narration: I decided that I was going to give colored pencils@to Ren for her birthday,@but I want to give her something more@than just normal colored pencils.
And then, while I struggled,@the goddess of ideas appeared!

group_1.textCenter: Hey guys! Check this out!@I totally tricked out my phone case!
That's it! That's an awesome idea!

group_1.narration: I decided that Ren's present@would be colored pencils and a pencil case.
Of course, it wouldn't just be a normal pencil set,@I would engrave her name on the pencils@and I would decorate the case@with a lily of the valley.
But...since that wasn't something@I could possibly make by myself,@I got Kano, the heir of Yayoi Plating,@to teach me and help me work on it.
To start things off,@we went to the woodwork factory@in Kano's neighborhood@to engrave Ren's name on the pencils!

group_1.textRight: Please accept these sweets as thanks!

group_1.textLeft: No no, I said it's all fine, it's fine.

group_1.textRight: Letting us borrow the factory and@machines just like that...

group_1.textLeft: I don't have any reason to reject a request.
From you or your friend, Kanoko!
So, let me explain how this works.

group_1.narration: With Kano and the man's help,@the name engraving was a success!
Which meant the next thing to do@was to make and form the case!
While borrowing space and machinery@in the Yayoi Plating factory,@I would work every day to make the case!
...Or at least, that was the plan.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
The ideal case material...@that also feels good to hold...
I'm still not sure what to go for...!

group_1.textRight: But like I said, normal material works fine!
After all, the focus will be the@lily of the valley engraving...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300101:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]That's no good!
With the wrong material, the engraving can end@up with a completely different look, okay?!
I won't allow you to make something@that's half-heartedly done...!

group_1.narration: This was where Kano's@pride in her work really exploded...
And so, Kano and I spent our time@after school and weekends looking for the right material.
Ren☆@To: Rika Ayano@Subject: Exhibit Invitation@I got tickets to a picture book@exhibit for next Saturday.@Do you wanna go together?

group_1.textCenter: (This is the first time Ren's...@...invited me to something.)
(...That's right, lately,@we haven't been hanging out at all...)
(...It should be fine as long as@it's just for a short while, right...?)

group_1.narration: Her birthday just keeps coming closer.
And the pencil case is far from done.@I haven't even started making it...
Also, at this rate,@I'll be searching for materials@with Kano again next Saturday too...
To: Ren☆@Thanks for the invite, but I already have@plans on Saturday, so I can't make it! (>_<)

group_1.textCenter: ...Okay, I have to get Kano to hurry up.

group_1.narration: As expected,@on the Saturday that Ren had invited me for,@I went out looking for materials with Kano...
But at last, she decided on the material!
But before I could start making the case@with the actual material, she had me practice@on scrap material, and the results weren't good at all...

group_1.textLeft: Alright, that's a fail.@Try again.

group_1.textRight: Kuaah~!@It's a lot harder than I thought it'd be...

group_1.textLeft: That's right,@it isn't something you can just do in one day!

group_1.textRight: It really isn't...@Maybe I was too optimistic...

group_1.textLeft: You want to make Ren happy, right?
Don't worry!
You're already a lot better than when you started.@Have faith in yourself and keep at it, okay?

group_1.narration: And so, we kept practicing every day...

group_1.textLeft: Let me see?
...Yeah, this looks good, don't you think?
If you're able to make this,@I think you can start using the actual material.
But before that, let's take a break, okay?

group_1.textCenter: Hallo, hallo!@Are you hanging in there, Rikki?!

group_1.textRight: Kano's coaching is merciless,@but I'm doing my absolute best.

group_1.textLeft: What coaching...
Seriously?!
Then, I have a reward for the absolute-maximum-@hardest-working Rikki!

group_1.textRight: Ah, candy?! [chara:303101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303101:cheek_0][chara:303101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:303101:lipSynch_1]I'll have some.@Thank you, Emirin!

group_1.textLeft: Yep, with this, both your motivation and flab@will increase!
Ren? What about?

group_1.narration: Ren☆@To: Rika Ayano@Subject: Teddy Bear Exhibit@There's a teddy bear exhibit at the art@museum in the Chuo district on Sunday.@Wanna go?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, I get that you want to hang out with her.
But you've kept at it this far@just so you can finish it, right?
Then, until the end...
do your best to finish the case to perfection!

group_1.textRight: I want Ren's present to be super perfect!

group_1.textLeft: If that's the case,@you'll have to work on it this weekend too!
Then...you won't be hanging out with Renki?

group_1.textRight: (...I feel bad for having to turn her down again...)
(I don't want to hurt her here...)

group_1.narration: Recipient: Ren☆@I'm sooooo sorry!@I'm taking some extra classes, so I won't@be able to hang out for a while...! (>_<)
And so...@on the Sunday that Ren had invited me out for,@Ren's birthday present was finally done...!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, thanks for all the help!@Seriously, you guys were great!
Kano, Emirin, thanks so much!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, no prob!@We got your back, girl!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: Errr, this is...ummm, it's not@like that... We just...I mean...

group_1.textLeft: ...Errr, umm...@...It's fine...

group_1.narration: On the Sunday Ren had invited me out...@Ren saw me together with Kano and Emirin...
